CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The band around 380 nm in the absorption spectra of PQCDTB and PCZDTB can be assigned to π-π* transition whereas the 530-550 band are due to intramolecular charge transfer ( ICT ) between donor and acceptor moieties.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

Explanation:

The material names in the given paragraph are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB". These are the names of the compounds whose absorption spectra are being discussed. They are mentioned in the context of the π-π* transition and intramolecular charge transfer (ICT) bands in their absorption spectra.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

Explanation:

The paragraph only contains two material names, "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB", which are the only entities presented in the table. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "band", "nm", "absorption spectra", "π-π\* transition", "530-550", "intramolecular charge transfer", and "donor and acceptor moieties" do not refer to material names and are not included in the table.
